::Feline::

She looked at Zardus with a slight smirk. "Oh, so your my commander. 
Well commander, Then I should show you more respect then." She 
saundered up to him and placed her hand on his shoulder.  She looked 
into his eyes and kissed him on the lips.  She then looked at 
him, "I'd like that drink now."  She smiled and purrred.  She took a 
step back just in case the commander needed to catch his breath.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus calmly looks down at Feline as she threatens him with her 
claws, a bit 
> surprised at her reaction. It wasn't consistent with her 
programming, he'd 
> have to check on it later.
> 
> "Relax. One of my troops accidently fired on you, thinking you were 
an enemy. 
> He has been punished."
> 
> He looks at her claws, then back at her. "I suggest you put those 
away, one 
> wrong move could cost your life. Follow me for the drink."
> 
> He walks to the door, looking back at her as it opens. "Welcome to 
the 
> Alliance," he says, "I am Zardus, your commander."
